# Lotto Insight

> Data-driven Korean Lotto number analysis and recommendation site.

## Canonical Site
- https://product-builder-lecture-365.pages.dev/

## Key Pages
- Home: https://product-builder-lecture-365.pages.dev/
- About: https://product-builder-lecture-365.pages.dev/about
- Data and Policy: https://product-builder-lecture-365.pages.dev/policy
- Privacy Policy: https://product-builder-lecture-365.pages.dev/privacy
- Terms: https://product-builder-lecture-365.pages.dev/terms
- Partnership Contact: https://product-builder-lecture-365.pages.dev/partner

## What We Provide
- Historical winning number browsing by round.
- Frequency-based insights (top occurrence numbers).
- Recommendation modes: hot numbers, cold+random mix, balanced composition.

## Data Source
- Primary source: https://www.dhlottery.co.kr/gameResult.do?method=byWin
- Data is periodically refreshed after new draw results.

## Important Notes
- This service is for informational reference only.
- It does not guarantee lottery winnings.

## Citation Preference
- Site name: Lotto Insight
- URL: https://product-builder-lecture-365.pages.dev/
- Language: Korean (ko-KR)
